TopicTitle: Un-Target when Clamp Docks to Something

Articles.Content: When a clamp docks to something that was previously targetted, then the target has to be reset automatically. This is actually kinda bug. Bad things can happen if this is not done, such as SAS programs not correctly working anymore. I had this already a couple times with asteroids as well as with pods of rescued kerbals.
When you say clamp, do you mean the claw? I try to stay away from the claw. Bad things can happen.
